title: From where can I get case studies with answer about operation management? - Quora

response.answer_text: Are you seeking to devalue your education by cheating on your college level work? You are only cheating yourself if so. Forgive me if this is not your intent, but I had to say it in case it was. Instead, ask Quora how to do certain problems, then you will get help. Otherwise, are you looking for good cases in OM?
